channel.title: [508]Tokkulscape HELP![508
channel.description:
Alright so im really good at coding with 317 servers but I wanna make a 508 server right now and i can see that it is ALOT harder! All i need to do is make myself owner! but whenever i give myself 3 rights it doesn't work and if i try 2 it becomes admin! I WANNA BE OWNER THO! Also when I open the client it asks for an ip! cant i just set the ip like in one of the files so it automatically connects? PLEASE REPLY ASAP! Also when i login it tells me like Welcome to W.E scape please use ::train or w.e How do i change tht?
Can someone please reply..

item.title: [508]Tokkulscape HELP![508
item.dc:creator: @Fadaman Fadaman
item.description:
@Fadaman wrote:

thank you so much!

Read full topic

item.title: [508]Tokkulscape HELP![508
item.dc:creator: @Xdivinex Xdivinex
item.description:
@Xdivinex wrote:

In a [508] server it doesnt fail like 317. Admin is as high as you can go. If you want to make commands that only you can do. You will have to add this after the commands only you wanna do.

 && p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("unleashed")) {

To fix your other problem… You will find that in login.java… just search ::train or whatever and change those lines of code to what you want

The ip question you can solve that by downloading a new client… You currently have an ip changer client… I actually prefer them because it’s really easy just to type 127.0.0.1 and log on from your server computer… Otherwise download a new client that isn’t ip changer…

Just use the search bar for a new client

Read full topic
